name: Speed Farmers
description:
Info

Speed farmers is a game where you need to farm as fast as you can.
You hire some land to farm on, but the taxes keep rising.
Try to survive as long as you can!


Price

The game is free for now... Go download it!

Discussion

You can create a thread on the discussion board for problems/help/ideas or more! I'll try to reply asap.

Current features

  • Day/night cycle
  • Nice 6x6 pixel art
  • 30 custom sound effects (10 x 3 variants)
  • Grow crops and grass (only wheat atm)
  • Sell crops
  • Farm stuff
  • Day counter
  • Buy stuff
  • Pay taxes
  • More upgrades
  • More crops
  • More items
  • Controller support
  • Local co-op
  • Main menu
  • Use your own poop as a fertilizer

Future features (Full version only)

  • More upgrades
  • More crops
  • Save system
  • More!
